title: Britain on show
creator_credit: Anthony Gilkison, Rayant Pictures and John Durst
brief_description: Britain’s contribution to the Brussels Universal and International Exhibition of 1958. A picture of the British people and their achievements in modern agriculture, industry, science, technology, and public administration, through examples from the exhibition. Aspects of life and work today, including young people at university, engineers building an atomic power station, teenagers dancing in a London cellar, and the Comet jet airliner under construction. Commentary by Stanley Van Beers.
